programme.title: To The Rescue
programme.desc: Upon discovering his girlfriend's disappearance, virologist Zhang Xuan travels to a foreign country to find her & becoming involved with bringing down conspirators plotting a global pandemic.

programme.title: Bride And The Beast
programme.desc: Every year, a young girl must be sacrificed to the mountain god or a curse would befall their small village. Two young men must now rescue their beloved when she is chosen to be sacrifice.

programme.title: Guardian Of Graveyard
programme.desc: Treasure hunters Xun Ye, Feng Yao, Cai Qing Yun, Wang Ya Zi & others encounter various dangers as they seek treasure at Qinling Phoenix Mountain, even averting conspiracies & diplomatic issues.

programme.title: Nine Colors Deer King
programme.desc: A strange disease has spread across Huanyi Village, prompting the guardian of the mountain Chang Sheng to find the legendary Nine-color Deer King to save the village.

programme.title: Special Lady Ep04
programme.desc: Adapted from a novel by Yu Jing Peng Xiang, this hilarious and sweet story tells of Song Zhu, the third lady of the Song family, who rebels against her arranged marriage to pursue true love.

programme.desc: Adapted from a novel by Yu Jing Peng Xiang, this hilarious and sweet story tells of Song Zhu, the third lady of the Song family, who rebels against her arranged marriage to pursue true love.

programme.title: The White Olive Tree Ep21
programme.desc: While reporting in the war-torn East Nation, journalist Song Ran encounters danger. She's rescued by Li Zan, a Chinese explosives engineer volunteering there. His gentle heart deeply attracts Song Ran.

programme.title: My Wife's Double Life Ep19
programme.desc: Adapted from a novel by author Yan Nong, a thief is tasked with finding implicating proof against a minister, only for her to marry and fall in love with the minister's son.
